title: New Jersey Firm Recalls Various Frozen, Ready-To-Eat Meat and Poultry Products Due To Potential Listeria Monocytogenes Contamination
summary: Editors Note: FSIS updated the release on July 20, 2012, to include case code information (case code 1782) to aid in identification of product subject to this recall. Only this information, denoted by the asterisk (*), has changed. WASHINGTON, July 19, 2012 - Buona Vita...
impacted_products: 30-lb. case of Silver Lake ".5 oz Cooked Meatballs made with chicken and beef"
